snippet: At a midday event in front of a gathering of college students, Mr. Santorum compared allowing gay couples to marry to polygamy, apparently equating the two as equally undesirable.
abstract: Rick Santorum, campaigning in New Hampshire for the Republican presidential nomination, is booed by college students over his views on same-sex marriage; he compared allowing gay couples to marry to polygamy, apparently equating the two as equally undesirable.
lead_paragraph: At a midday event in front of a gathering of college students, Mr. Santorum compared allowing gay couples to marry to polygamy, apparently equating the two as equally undesirable.

headline.main: Students Jeer Santorum on New Hampshire Blitz
headline.print_headline: Students Jeer Santorum On New Hampshire Blitz

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
